Query.Name: Totaal - LIDAR Maaiveld
Query.SQL: select st_AsText(geom) from ahn_sample where classificatie = 2

Query.Name: Totaal - DEM maaiveld
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump(ST_DelaunayTriangles(st_collect( geom ), 10))).geom ) from ahn_sample where classificatie = 2

Query.Name: Totaal - LIDAR Panden
Query.SQL: select st_AsText(geom) from ahn_sample where classificatie = 6

Query.Name: Totaal - LIDAR Groen
Query.SQL: select st_AsText(geom) from ahn_sample where classificatie = 1

Query.Name: Totaal - Pand contouren
Query.SQL:
select st_AsText( st_extrude( ( ST_Force3D( ( p.geom )) ), 0,0,random() * 10) ) from groningen.pand p
where p.geom && st_expand(st_geomfromtext('point(233928.46 582078.83)', 28992), 200, 200, 0)

Query.Name: Totaal - Pand Extrude 3D
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump(( st_extrude(ST_ExteriorRing( p.geom ), 0, 0, 10 )))).geom ) from pand p

Query.Name: Pand - LIDAR
Query.SQL: select st_AsText(m.geom) from pand p, ahn_sample m where p.geom && m.geom and st_intersects(p.geom, m.geom) and identificatie = '1722100000003767' and classificatie = 6

Query.Name: Pand - DEM
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump(ST_DelaunayTriangles(st_collect( m.geom ), 0.5))).geom ) from pand p, ahn_sample m where p.geom && m.geom and st_intersects(p.geom, m.geom) and identificatie = '1722100000003767' and classificatie = 6

Query.Name: Pand - Extrude 3D
Query.SQL: select st_astext ( st_translate ( (st_dump( st_tesselate(st_extrude(st_simplify(geom, 0.1), 0::float, 0::float, 5.5::float)) )).geom, 0, 0, ( select (avg(st_z(m.geom)))::float from pand p, ahn_sample m where p.geom && m.geom and st_intersects(st_buffer(p.geom, 2), m.geom) and identificatie = '1722100000003767' and classificatie = 2 limit 1 ) ) ) from pand where identificatie = '1722100000003767'

Query.Name: Pand - Maaiveld #1 (slow)
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump(ST_DelaunayTriangles(st_collect( m.geom ), 2))).geom ) from pand p, ahn_sample m where st_intersects(st_buffer(p.geom, 5), m.geom) and identificatie = '1722100000003767' and classificatie = 2

Query.Name: Pand - Maaiveld #2 (fast)
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump(ST_DelaunayTriangles(st_collect( m.geom ), 0.1))).geom ) from ahn_sample m where st_intersects( (select st_buffer(geom, 5) from pand where identificatie = '1722100000003767' limit 1), m.geom ) and classificatie = 2

Query.Name: Maaiveld vs Kabel intersectie
Query.SQL: select st_AsText( (st_dump( ST_3DInterSection( (ST_DelaunayTriangles(st_collect( geom ), 10)), (select st_translate(geom, 0, 0, 5 ) from kabel)) )).geom ) from ahn_sample where classificatie = 2

Query.Name: RGB PointCloud
Query.SQL: select st_AsText(geom), r, g, b from public.rgb_sample
